analysis.description:
TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/26/0xb360b407b15a86a0d69abc0f2b6ae8f4c7a558eb.sol#433-446) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/26/0xb360b407b15a86a0d69abc0f2b6ae8f4c7a558eb.sol#439-440)

TimedCrowdsale.isOpen (/unique_chucks/26/0xb360b407b15a86a0d69abc0f2b6ae8f4c7a558eb.sol#456-462) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= _openingTime && block.timestamp <= _closingTime (/unique_chucks/26/0xb360b407b15a86a0d69abc0f2b6ae8f4c7a558eb.sol#461-462)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/26/0xb360b407b15a86a0d69abc0f2b6ae8f4c7a558eb.sol#465-474) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > _closingTime (/unique_chucks/26/0xb360b407b15a86a0d69abc0f2b6ae8f4c7a558eb.sol#473)

FthCrowdsale.rewardTokenAmount (/unique_chucks/26/0xb360b407b15a86a0d69abc0f2b6ae8f4c7a558eb.sol#589-614) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- timePeriod < 2 (/unique_chucks/26/0xb360b407b15a86a0d69abc0f2b6ae8f4c7a558eb.sol#607-613)
	- timePeriod < 1 (/unique_chucks/26/0xb360b407b15a86a0d69abc0f2b6ae8f4c7a558eb.sol#604-613)
	- timePeriod < 3 (/unique_chucks/26/0xb360b407b15a86a0d69abc0f2b6ae8f4c7a558eb.sol#608-613)

FthCrowdsale._unlockPercent (/unique_chucks/26/0xb360b407b15a86a0d69abc0f2b6ae8f4c7a558eb.sol#675-689) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- unlockPercent > max (/unique_chucks/26/0xb360b407b15a86a0d69abc0f2b6ae8f4c7a558eb.sol)
	- period < _unlockPeriod (/unique_chucks/26/0xb360b407b15a86a0d69abc0f2b6ae8f4c7a558eb.sol)
